title: Can't install Firefox
content: I can't install Firefox on my 2015 iMac, which is running Montery 12.2.6 OS. I had to reinstall everything after erasing my HD due to it not starting up for some reason, but now I get the message "“Firefox 135.0.dmg” is damaged and can’t be opened." every time I try to install Firefox. Any ideas how to get Firefox back?

title: Need Special Characters for my Projects?
content: I was working always on a project in Firefox and needed some special characters and symbols that weren't available on my keyboard. After some searching, I found an same called https://coolsymbol.in/ coolsymbols that offers a huge collection of special characters, and emojis.

title: AMEX Infection in Address Bar
content: I like to be able to type a single letter into the address bar and go to a website based on previous history. For example I type 's' and speedtest.net pops up. I'd like to type 'g' and get google like I used to. Now, instead, global.americanesxpress.com auto-populates and cannot be "removed from history". I have disabled anything with the word suggest. I've unchecked everything under Address Bar except Browsing History and nothing removes this offensive site from the url bar. So I disabled Browsing history and just type the full URL. Is there any way to remove this site or is it now a part of the browser itself?
creator: yraegel
